meanings.definition: Having great power or abilities beyond the normal range.
meanings.sent1: The superhero was superpowered and could lift cars effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The robot had superpowered sensors that could detect even the faintest sounds.
meanings.sent3: The superpowered vacuum cleaner sucked up dirt in seconds, leaving the room spotless.
meanings.sent4: Her superpowered memory could recall every detail of the event as if it happened yesterday.
meanings.sent5: The superpowered athlete leaped over hurdles with unbelievable speed and agility.

meanings.definition: Equipped with extraordinary strength or capabilities.
meanings.sent1: The superpowered machine could crush rocks with ease.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's suit was superpowered, granting him invincibility.
meanings.sent3: The superpowered blender could blend anything, even a brick!
meanings.sent4: Her superpowered will allowed her to overcome any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The superpowered car zoomed past other vehicles on the highway.
